specials.name: Berserk Slam
specials.description: Requirement The blood golem is berserk. Effect The blood golem Strikes with its fist at a –1 circumstance penalty. If it hits, it deals 1d6 extra damage and knocks the target prone.

specials.name: Weakness bleed 10
specials.description: Berserk A severely damaged blood golem has a chance of going berserk. If it has 40 or fewer HP at the start of its turn, the golem must succeed at a DC 5 flat check or go berserk. A berserk golem wildly attacks the nearest living creature, or the nearest object if no creatures are nearby.

immunity.value: disease, death effects, electricity, doomed, drained, fatigued, healing, magic (see below), mental, necromancy, nonlethal attacks, paralyzed, poison, sickened, unconscious
